news.message: 🏆 Our TVCG Journal publication on IEEE VR 25 for Investigating the Impact of Video Pass-Through Embodiment on Presence and Performance in Virtual Reality just received an Honorable Mention Award. LinkedIn Post
Attending this years 30th ACM Symposium on Virtual Reality Software and Technology (VRST) in Trier, Germany.

Keynote Speaker at Rendezvous mit der Zukunft:
Inclusion Through Innovation - Avatars as Pioneers for a Barrier-Free Society
🏆Best Poster Award on IEEE VR 24
